title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. XXXII, pt. 1208 - Uniform Code: Training of Staff
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. XXXII, pt. 1208 - Uniform Code: Training of Staff

State Regulations

Subpart 1208-1 - Introduction, Purpose and Definitions (§ 1208-1.1 to 1208-1.2)

Subpart 1208-2 - Minimum Training Requirements and Minimum Standards (§ 1208-2.1 to 1208-2.2)

Subpart 1208-3 - Certification of Building Safety Inspectors and Code Enforcement Officials (§ 1208-3.1 to 1208-3.5)

Subpart 1208-4 - Certification of Training Courses and Instructors (§ 1208-4.1 to 1208-4.3)

Subpart 1208-5 - Miscellaneous Provisions (§ 1208-5.1 to 1208-5.5)

Subpart 1208-6 - SUSPENSION OR REVOCATION OF CERTIFICATIONS (§ 1208-6.1 to 1208-6.9)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. XXXII, pt. 1208

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §
381[1][b]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
